column1: International Tourism and Event Management MSc
column5: ﻿YOUR INTERNATIONAL TOURISM & EVENT MANAGEMENT MASTER’S PROGRAMAccording to the Federal Association of German Tourism Industry, tourism accounts for one in 15 jobs in Germany. Around the world, as many as one in ten jobs are directly or indirectly based in the tourism and event sector. As a graduate of the Master’s study program in International Tourism & Event Management (M.Sc.), you have an ideal foundation for a career in the global tourism and events sector with excellent job prospects and development opportunities.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
